class.name: HiLoMarker
class.documentation: The position of a maxima/minima value may be marked by plotting a symbol on the precise location. Users may define their own symbol by setting the parameter CONTOUR_HILO_MARKER_INDEX

parameter.name: contour_hilo_marker_index
parameter.documentation: Table number of marker symbol. See chapter on Plotting Attributes

parameter.name: contour_hilo_marker_colour
parameter.documentation: Colour of grid point markers(Full choice of colours)

class.name: NoHiLoMarker
class.documentation: This object suppresses the plotting of Hi/Lo markers
